titleStmt.title: William B. James to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1128

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Requisitions for the Return of Fugitives from Justice, 1863-1867

body.p: I enclose you copy of Indictment pending in Allen County Circuit Court vs Robert Hillman & others for Robbery. All the defendants are fugitives from Justice, were all guerillas of Harper's gang.

We know that Hillman is in Illinois, Our Sheriff Dalton has to make a trip to Illinois shortly, and I desire a requisition on the Governor of Illinois, Appoint Geoge W Dalton the agent of the state &C, send papers to me

Requisition upon Gov Illinois for Robt. Hilburn Robbery & Geo W. Dalton apptd. Agent
9th Oct/65
